name: Keith Martin
testimonial: You can't put a price on the smiles on the faces of residents when they see these pictures and comments from their loved ones.

name: Daughter of resident
testimonial: What a wonderful idea this is. It is such a pleasure to sign in and see what is happening. It is so important.

name: Anne Marie Woods
testimonial: ADON's and CNM's find Altra user friendly. It is very easy to use and has saved us a lot of time dealing with staff. Overall very happy with Altra.

name: Tristan Waldear
testimonial: Tines has enabled a level of customization and utility that wasn't previously available to Box's security analysts. Now, incident response analysts can customize the workflow to suit their needs. And they can add extra features to suit their own playbook.

name: John McSweeney
testimonial: Our success is built on automation, and that success is built on Tines.

name: Tom Sage
testimonial: Thanks to Tines, the first time an analyst looks at the case, they already have all the information they need to decide what action to take. This workflow saves around 50% of an analyst's time working on each case.
